sentences.cn: 一名有动机的发言者诞生了.

sentences.en: And he shares the lessons he learned from his ordeal as a motivational speaker.
sentences.cn: 他也成为励志演说家,把自己从那场苦难中学到的经验、教训和感悟传播给更多的人.

sentences.en: Fortunately, cellular providers are stepping up to fill the motivational vacuum.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是, 移动电话服务商正在逐步填补这个积极性真空.

sentences.en: He quit his truck - driving job and tried hand as a motivational speaker, which didn't pan out.
sentences.cn: 他辞了卡车司机的工作,想成为励志演说家, 可是没成.

sentences.en: It is also a great motivational tool for anyone trying to lose weight.
sentences.cn: 这也是非常棒的减肥手段.

sentences.en: It may well be the case that the people raising the concerns have a personal or motivational problem with the improvement but don't feel comfortable voicing it.
sentences.cn: 很可能那些提出个人担忧的人就有某种个人或动机问题需要改进，这是好事，但说出来以后并不一定会感到舒服一些。

sentences.en: Managers use a full arsenal of motivational techniques to get employees to take risks.
sentences.cn: 管理者运用各种激励措施使雇员勇于冒险。

sentences.en: My motivational system ensures that when I imagine the objectively better future it looks really great, far better than all the other options -- I'll be so happy!
sentences.cn: 我的动机系统确保当我想象客观上更好的未来时，会感觉这种选择很棒，比其他所有选择都要棒得多──我会非常快乐！

sentences.en: Other message categories are humor, motivational sayings, riddles and translated Chinese idioms.
sentences.cn: 其他签语种类还包括幽默 、 励志格言 、 谜语和中国俗谚的翻译.

sentences.en: Outstanding coaching motivational skills having demonstrated the ability to mentor less experienced artists.
sentences.cn: 具有能够指导培训缺少经验的团队成员的能力.

sentences.en: Positive thinking is not just a motivational idea.
sentences.cn: 积极思维不单是一种激励人的想法.

sentences.en: Read Books - Not just self - help or motivational books, but any book that has new ideas.
sentences.cn: 读书 - 不只是读 自我 激励或是历志的书, 还要读任何有新观点的书.

sentences.en: Ryan, a motivational psychologist at the University and lead investigator the four new studies about gaming.
sentences.cn: Ryan说, 他是一位Rochester大学的动机心理学家,并且领导有关游戏的4个新研究项目的调查人员.

sentences.en: Strong interpersonal communication, motivational and team building ability.
sentences.cn: 优秀的人际沟通 、 员工激励、团队建设能力.

sentences.en: The meeting room was hung with motivational banners.
sentences.cn: 会议室里挂满了充满鼓动性的标语.

sentences.en: This is The Institute for Motivational Research.
Use unique assessment process to identify employee's preferred motivational approach.
sentences.cn: 采用独特的评估方法,从而辨识最适合驱动个别员工的激励方法.

words.tran_cn: 主题；动机；主旨；图形；意念
动作；移动；手势；请求；意向
使产生动机；激发…的积极性（motivate的过去式和过去分词）
刺激；使有动机；激发…的积极性

phrases.tran_cn: 激励技能；激励方法（motivational technique的复数）
